meanings.definition: superlative form of brawly, meaning strong or muscular
meanings.sent1: He was the brawliest man in the gym, lifting the heaviest weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler showed off his brawliest moves in the ring, overpowering his opponent.
meanings.sent3: The brawliest squirrel in the park challenged all others to an acorn-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: Her brawliest determination shone through as she completed the marathon without stopping.
meanings.sent5: The brawliest oak tree in the forest stood tall and unyielding against the storm.

meanings.definition: superlative form of brawly, meaning tough or aggressive
meanings.sent1: The brawliest dog in the neighborhood barked loudly at any stranger approaching the house.
meanings.sent2: The team captain's brawliest attitude motivated the players to give their best on the field.
meanings.sent3: The brawliest cat in the alley always got into fights with other felines over territory.
meanings.sent4: Her brawliest glare silenced the noisy room in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The brawliest storm of the season brought heavy rain and strong winds to the town.
